content: Credit Card Education Cashback Asked by AnonymousAsked on 17 Sep 2019What credit card gives cashback for payment for courses at educational institutions?Some credit cards listed this as exclusion. UOB One recently also included this as exclusion (starting from 1 Sep).1 answerAnswerBump1

Loh Tat Tian, 2nd Hand Insurance Broker / EX-FA at Singapore Insurance Value FindingLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 17 Sep 2019Do they accept AXS payment? If they do, top-up to grab, then use GrabPay (as the paying account) through AXS. IF not... find other ways.. like SC cashback card.0 comments1
